short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Compare Southwest flights and export data as a CSV

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For those who like to see all the options, this tool will help you compare Southwest flights. 

This extension adds a checkbox next to each flight in your search. When you check the boxes of all the flights you're interested in, you can download the results as a CSV. 

This makes it easy to compare flights to all the various airports in LA on a few different days, for example.
